ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do they want to hasten Our punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do they wish Us then to hasten the punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Do they really want Our chastisement to be expedited?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do they want to hasten Our torment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So do they wish to hasten Our punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Would they then wish for Our torment to be hastened on
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: What! do they still seek to hasten on Our punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What, do they seek to hasten Our chastisement?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Would they (now) hasten on Our doom?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do they want to hasten Our punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Seek haste then they with our torment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So do they seek to hasten on Our punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Do they then ask for Our Penalty to be hastened on?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Would they then wish for Our Torment to be hastened on?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do they wish to hasten Our punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do they seek to hasten Our punishment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So for Our punishment are they impatient?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:204] So do they [seek to] hasten Our chastisement?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Would they (now) hasten on Our doom) the coming of Our punishment?
